column5: Thought i would share Background Information to Fisheries Management Plan for Fisheries Management Zone 17.. This is an extensive report looking deep into our fisheries within Zone 17, there's a lot of information which is useful to know.. Knowledge is key..... enjoy!  Zone 17 Report
Wonder if 4 years later all those stocking efforts did anything..
Im digging for that information as we speak.....

Tons of information. This is the area i fished all my life. From having cottage on Pigeon Lake to fishing the eastern tribs. A huge read on history and future of the Kawarthas and Ganaraska, etc... to be bookmarked. Many thanks for providing this.

As an FYI, the FMZ17 Council, with MNR and OFAH, is holding an evening walleye information workshop on Oct 24th in Peterborough. It's open to the public and free to attend, but registration is required because of limited seating at the facility.  Full details are at http://www.ofah.org/fishing/fmz-17-walleye-workshop
